page.title: 01GENERAL OVERVIEW
page.content: The area under study consists of parts of the City of Coventry and parts of rural Warwickshire. The{Coventry}section consists of part of the area known as{Wood End}which is mainly council housing built in the 1950's and 60's.This area has many social problems.The rest of the Coventry area under study is the area known as{Potters Green}which is mainly 1960's private housing,with a much lesser degree of social problems.There are some small industrial premises in the areas.Coventry is currently in the {West Midlands County}but is due to revert to Warwickshire in 1987. The {Warwickshire}area is mainly rural with the small villages of{Ansty {and Barnacle}in the square.This area is both a dormitory for Coventry and well-established farmland.
